direction.raw_text: is shown along with his friends and family in a celebration...a sense of "one big unending party." During this opening segment WE SEE some of the characters that will later appear in the story: JOHNNY BOY, MICHAEL, TONY, TERESA, CHARLIE'S UNCLE GIOVANNI, and others. They are all Sicilian and are members of the same Italian- American neighborhood in New York City. (WE SENSE, from these HOME MOVIES, that the neighborhood forces its people to be strongly tied together in a way of life - Family, Church, Friendship.) These HOME MOVIES were taken during some formal and casual gatherings in which CHARLIE participated.

direction.raw_text: nods and watches the car pull away. Then he picks up his bag from the sidewalk and walks into the terminal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The place is huge and there is a lot of bustle and excitement.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: is noticeable because he is the only member of the crowd who walks slowly, without any apparent mission or destination. He makes his way toward the large flight board that looms over the whole room. Loudspeakers announce planes to and from every part of the world. On the flight board, the origins and destinations of the days flight spin and change every moment. He passes the insurance machines and almost stops - more upset than before. A businessman calmly pays for insurance. (Muzak is heard) CHARLIE continues on past a novelty shop where some plastic crosses and St. Christopher medals hang alongside the stuffed toy dogs and flight bags. He looks at the cross.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know what to say to you... The ticket desk is under the flight board. CHARLIE eventually works his way over to the desk, drops his bag on the floor and stands staring at the board. He sees the names of dozens of cities flashing before him. As he watches, a pretty ticket clerk speaks to him from behind the desk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: May I help you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: stares at the flight board in dismay and indecision. He apparently does not hear her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir, may I help you?
direction.name: direction
